revised_title: Afferent Connections to Primate Motor and Somatic Sensory Cortices: An Experimental Electron Microscopy Study
tldr: This study investigates the termination of afferent connections to the primate sensorimotor cortex using electron microscopy. The research focuses on thalamocortical, commissural, and association connections in the motor and somatic sensory cortices. The findings provide insights into the ultrastructure and sites of termination of these connections, contributing to the understanding of the complex neural networks in the brain.
